thread.title: Raymond

author: Raymond
title: Raymond
text: I bought the Derma hat that has a flap in the back to keep the sun off the back of your neck. Having just finished a very uncomfortable treatment of Efuflex (you skin cancer folks know of it), I wanted more protection than my old hats, especially for the back of my neck. It's a very comfortable hat I've been wearing in the garden (yes, even in January in Texas) and plan to wear on an upcoming tropical trip. I love it.
